GSKB

Geneset Knowledgebase : a knowledgebase for pathway analysis in multiple species

Genes that flock together

Start Query 
Fields searched: Geneset label, First Author, Brief Description, Genes, Gene Symbols and Citation.
    Examples (remove quotes when using): Gene names (like "GAPDH"), keywords (like "cold"), or first authors (like "Mueller")
    Plus and minus signs may be used to require or forbid inclusion (like "+GAPDH" or "-BRCA2") and wildcards may also be used at the end of words (like "WRKY*")
